articles.title: You can never be totally prepared for a leadership role, says HP Singapore's managing director - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: A "tiger mum" at work and a laidback one at home, Vivian Chua tells CNA Women what she did when HP first rejected her because she didn't have a degree and how she eventually became one of the company's top executives.

articles.title: Asia Cup 2022: India face Super 4 elimination after another final over defeat as Sri Lanka chase down 174 - India Today
articles.description: Asia Cup 2022: India suffered their second-straight defeat in the Super 4 stage as a disciplined Sri Lanka chased down the 174-run target to make two in two wins in Dubai on Tuesday.

articles.title: Tech workers left hanging as Sea e-commerce arm Shopee rescinds job offers - TODAY
articles.description: SINGAPORE/HONG KONG — Southeast Asia's largest e-commerce firm Shopee has rescinded dozens of job offers in the past two weeks, sources said, a move that began shortly after parent company Sea reported widening losses and sharply slower revenue growth.
